eshmun.expression.visitor.visitors

Class FillDocumentVisitor.TextAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.expression.visitor.visitors.FillDocumentVisitor.TextAttribute
  • Enclosing class:
    FillDocumentVisitor

    private class FillDocumentVisitor.TextAttribute
extends java.lang.Object
    Pairs a text with its style attributes.

    The text and its respective style are matched by index.

    One instance of this class could contain multiple pairs.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kinan Dak Al Bab
